alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 6:43PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Wakulla and northeastern Franklin Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 643 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles southeast of Carrabelle to 13 miles south of St. Marks. Movement was west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Sopchoppy, Carrabelle Beach, Alligator Point, Saint Teresa, Turkey Point, Bald Point, Royal Bluff, Panacea-Wakulla Airport, Mcintyre, Yent Place, Sanborn, Panacea, Buckhorn, Lanark Village and Curtis Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Wakulla
